text: he logo jo eemaan laaye ho![1] hansee na udaaye koee jaati kisee any jaati kee. ho sakata hai ki vah unase achchhee ho aur na naaree any naariyon kee. ho sakata hai ki vo unase achchhee hon tatha aakshep na lagao ek-doosare ko aur na kisee ko buree upaadhi do. bura naam hai apashabd eemaan ke pashchaat aur jo kshama na maangen, to vahee log atyaachaaree hain
